CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing CrimsonLink relative to AetherNet?
SRP.A: CrimsonLink is {below} AetherNet in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing NovaStream relative to CrimsonLink?
SRP.A: NovaStream is {above} CrimsonLink in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AetherNet relative to NovaStream?
SRP.A: AetherNet is {below} NovaStream in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total daily active users?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {CrimsonLink}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total daily active users?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {EchoWave}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is EchoWave's maximum Daily Active Users in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: EchoWave's maximum Daily Active Users is in {1990}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is NovaStream's minimum Daily Active Users in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: NovaStream's minimum Daily Active Users is in {1978}.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1988, was the average total Daily Active Users higher or lower than between 1989 and 1994?
NC.A: The average total daily active users between 1983 and 1988 was {lower} than between 1989 and 1994.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1989, did the total Daily Active Users experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1991?
NC.A: The change in total daily active users between 1983 and 1989 was {larger} than between 1985 and 1991.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 1993, was the average total Daily Active Users higher or lower than between 1978 and 1982?
NC.A: The average total daily active users between 1988 and 1993 was {higher} than between 1978 and 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1984, did the total Daily Active Users experience a larger or smaller change than between 1983 and 1994?
NC.A: The change in total daily active users between 1983 and 1984 was {smaller} than between 1983 and 1994.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {CrimsonLink} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did EchoWave and CrimsonLink first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: EchoWave and CrimsonLink first exchanged leading positions in {1979}.
